thread.title: Claude Covelli Statement re: Wisconsin Supreme Court Appointment
thread.title_full: Claude Covelli Statement re: Wisconsin Supreme Court Appointment - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Claude Covelli Statement re: Wisconsin Supreme Court Appointment
text:
Claude Covelli
MADISON, Wis. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- "I am disappointed, but remain resolute in my belief that Wisconsin needs and wants a nonpartisan voice on the Wisconsin Supreme Court. Justices are duty-bound to disregard political preferences. I consider the nonpartisan way to always be the best way for a justice to serve the people of the state and the law."
Covelli is considering next steps and will make an announcement regarding his potential candidacy for the Court soon.
CONTACT: Claude Covelli 608-234-2204 or 608-283-1782 cjcovelli20@gmail.com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/claude-covelli-statement-re-wisconsin-supreme-court-appointment-300157285.html
